mapper.insert: insert into bbs (bbs_no,bbs_name,bbs_title,bbs_pwd,bbs_cont,bbs_file,bbs_hit,bbs_ref,bbs_step, bbs_level,bbs_date) values(bbs_no_seq.nextval, #{bbs_name}, #{bbs_title}, #{bbs_pwd}, #{bbs_cont}, #{bbs_file}, 0, bbs_no_seq.nextval, 0,0,sysdate)
mapper.update: update bbs set bbs_name=#{bbs_name}, bbs_title=#{bbs_title}, bbs_cont=#{bbs_cont}, bbs_file=#{bbs_file} where bbs_no=#{bbs_no}
